thread.title: M Who? 2017 BMW Alpina B7 xDrive Tested!
thread.title_full: M Who? 2017 BMW Alpina B7 xDrive Tested!

author: Alexander Stoklosa
title: M Who? 2017 BMW Alpina B7 xDrive Tested!
text:
-In the early 1960s, Burkard Bovensiepen found escape from his family’s German typewriter-manufacturing business by affixing hotter carbs in BMWs. Stealing the Alpina name from the typewriter outfit, he earned racing success and developed a sort of clairvoyance, anticipating high-performance BMWs before BMW did, starting with the more powerful Alpina 1500 and 1600 sedans, which predated the factory 1800 and iconic 2002. READ MORE ›› 
-
